meanings.definition: One who visits a person or place.
meanings.sent1: The friendly visitor brought a gift to the hospital.
meanings.sent2: The tourist was a visitor at the famous museum.
meanings.sent3: The visitor accidentally sat on the doctor's chair and pretended to give a check-up.
meanings.sent4: The visitor's presence in the small town was like a burst of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The young visitor explored the forest with wide eyes and a curious heart.

meanings.definition: A person who is visiting a website or other online location.
meanings.sent1: The website visitor clicked on the link to read the article.
meanings.sent2: The online visitor left a comment on the blog post.
meanings.sent3: The visitor tried to shake hands with the virtual characters on the screen.
meanings.sent4: The sudden increase in website visitors was like a digital stampede.
meanings.sent5: The curious visitor scrolled through the webpage, eager to learn more.
